examples.description: checks the bills sales tax effects ledgers generated from multi-category bills
examples.full_description: SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck checks the bills sales tax effects ledgers generated from multi-category bills
SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when sales tax effects are correct behaves like no check errors doesn't report any failure

examples.description: is expected to have a failure on #<Bill id: 10, contact_id: 1051239421, reference: "REF001", dated_on: "2022-12-15", due_date: "2022-1...erty_id: nil, bill_items_count: 3, input_total_values_inc_tax: false, is_paid_by_hire_purchase: nil>
examples.full_description: SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when there are unexpected sales tax effects is expected to have a failure on #<Bill id: 10, contact_id: 1051239421, reference: "REF001", dated_on: "2022-12-15", due_date: "2022-1...erty_id: nil, bill_items_count: 3, input_total_values_inc_tax: false, is_paid_by_hire_purchase: nil>

examples.description: is expected to have a failure like /sales tax effects are incorrect/
examples.full_description: SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when there are unexpected sales tax effects is expected to have a failure like /sales tax effects are incorrect/
SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when the additional_description of an effect has changed behaves like no check errors doesn't report any failure
SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when the description of an effect has changed behaves like no check errors doesn't report any failure
SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when the effects are different but have the same tax affect behaves like no check errors doesn't report any failure
SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when there are extra effects that sum to nothing behaves like no check errors doesn't report any failure

examples.description: is expected to have a failure on #<Bill id: 16, contact_id: 1051239427, reference: "REF001", dated_on: "2022-12-15", due_date: "2022-1...erty_id: nil, bill_items_count: 3, input_total_values_inc_tax: false, is_paid_by_hire_purchase: nil>

examples.description: is expected to have a failure like /sales tax effects are incorrect/
examples.full_description: SalesTaxEffects::BillCheck behaves like a sales tax effects check when the effects have the same tax values but different capital_asset_ids is expected to have a failure like /sales tax effects are incorrect/

Bill can_start_payment? when there are no payment intents is expected to eql true
Bill can_start_payment? when the last payment intent is approved is expected to eql false
Bill can_start_payment? when the last payment intent is rejected is expected to eql true
Bill can_start_payment? when the last payment intent is pending is expected to eql false
Bill#payment_approved_and_not_paid? when the bill is open is expected to be falsey
Bill#payment_approved_and_not_paid? when the bill has an approved payit payment and not reconciled is expected to eql true
Bill#payment_approved_and_not_paid? when the bill is paid is expected to be falsey
Bill#payment_approved_and_not_paid? when the bill has an approved payit payment and has been reconciled is expected to eql false

examples.description: displays the Last updated string in FreeAgent green
examples.full_description: mtd_itsa/submissions/_tax_estimate with an estimated calculation that was retrieved today displays the Last updated string in FreeAgent green

examples.description: displays the Last updated string in FreeAgent grey
examples.full_description: mtd_itsa/submissions/_tax_estimate with an estimated calculation that was retrieved before today displays the Last updated string in FreeAgent grey

examples.description: displays a calculated bill with payment due date
examples.full_description: mtd_itsa/submissions/_tax_estimate with a final calculation that calculates a bill displays a calculated bill with payment due date

examples.description: displays a calculated refund with no payment due date
examples.full_description: mtd_itsa/submissions/_tax_estimate with a final calculation that calculates a refund displays a calculated refund with no payment due date
admin/signups/show renders the signup attempt details

examples.description: shows a Notice with the reason the signup was blocked
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show for a blocked signup shows a Notice with the reason the signup was blocked

examples.description: displays a message if an email has already been sent
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show for a blocked signup where an email has already been sent displays a message if an email has already been sent

examples.description: says that an email has yet to be sent
examples.full_description: admin/signups/show for a blocked signup where an email has not been sent says that an email has yet to be sent
admin/signups/show for a valid signup does not show a Notice
BankFeeds::BankFeedsController render banksy login form simple form with text fields
